Question
========

Given is the equation below for the repeated measures ANOVA model: 

$X_{ij} = \mu+\pi_{i}+\tau_{j}+e_{ij}^{*}$

What it stands for $\tau_{j}$? 
Answerlist
----------
* The average for person *j* across repeated measurements.
* The mean for time *j* across persons.
* The deviation of person *j* from the overall mean.
* The deviation of time *j* from the overall mean.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
